org.fujion.thread

Class ThreadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.thread.ThreadUtil

  • public class ThreadUtil
extends Object
    Static thread-related utility methods.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        delay - Delay before the task is executed.
        unit - Time unit for the delay.

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        public static ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable task,
                                                     long initialDelay,
                                                     long period,
                                                     TimeUnit unit)
        Schedule a task to run repeatedly after the an initial delay.
        Parameters:
        task - Task to execute.
        initialDelay - Delay before the task is first executed.
        period - Interval between initiation of tasks.
        unit - Time unit for initial delay and period.
        Returns:
        Future for monitoring progress of the task.

      • scheduleWithFixedDelay

        public static ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable task,
                                                        long initialDelay,
                                                        long delay,
                                                        TimeUnit unit)
        Schedule a task to run repeatedly after an initial delay.
        Parameters:
        task - Task to execute.
        initialDelay - Delay before the task is first executed.
        delay - Delay between completion of a task and initiation of its successor.
        unit - Time unit for initial delay and delay.
        Returns:
        Future for monitoring progress of the task.
